50.eng-name: The Book of Seeking Refuge with Allah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Uthman bin Abi Al-'As that:The Prophet [SAW] used to say supplication in these words: "Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-kasali, walharami, wal-jubni, wal-'ajzi, wa min fitnatil-mahya wal-mamat. (O Allah, I seek refuge in You from laziness, old age, cowardice, and incapacity, and from the trials of life and death)
